definition: "The Hunt for Red October", a novel by Tom Clancy
pinyin: Lie4 sha1 Hong2 se4 Shi2 yue4 hao4

definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
